member.name: T:ActorsGallery.Data.Utilities.ResponseBody
member.summary: The default response body for all requests to this API with Status, Message and Data fields

member.name: P:ActorsGallery.Data.Utilities.ResponseBody.Status
member.summary: An one-word indication of whether the operation succeeded (normal) or failed (error)

member.name: P:ActorsGallery.Data.Utilities.ResponseBody.Payload
member.summary: This dynamic property, if not null, contains the payload returned for a given request

member.name: P:ActorsGallery.Data.Utilities.ResponseBody.Message
member.summary: A one-sentence confirmation if the operation succeeded; otherwise a listing of error messages
